entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
